r.n: - fix gh#234 mmap disabled when configure is called with --enable-apcu-mmap - fix gh#226 Warning: apcu_fetch(): apc_fetch() expects a string or array of strings. - mitigate gh#223 Fatal error when starting php on windows - add support for PCRE2 in 7.3 - use row formatting for information in phpinfo() tables - set IS_STR_PERSISTENT so refcounting failures are reported by -DRC_DEBUG=1 - fix gh#266 refcounting errors in APCIterator
